DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability and population pharmacokinetics of oral nemonoxacin in community-acquired pneumonia (CAP) subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Clinical Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Nemonoxacin Malate in Treating Adult Patients With Community-acquired Pneumonia (CAP)
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluate clinical efficacy, microbiological efficacy and safety of Nemonoxacin adult patients with community-acquired pneumonia (CAP); and A study on the population pharmacokinetics (PPK) of continuous oral administration of Nemonoxacin in adult patients with CAP.
